programme.title: A Experiência Belko
programme.desc: Numa retorcida experiência social, 80 americanos são trancados no edifício dos escritórios da sua empresa em Bogotá, na Colômbia. Entretanto, recebem ordens de uma voz misteriosa, que os instiga a participar num jogo mortal que implica matar ou ser morto...

programme.title: Um Osso Duro de Roer
programme.desc: Patrick é um homem excêntrico e pouco sociável que vive sozinho com os pais numa casa rural de Washington. Nutre uma adoração possessiva pela irmã e quando esta aparece com o noivo Ryan, começa a deliberar como matá-lo. Só que nunca consegue fazê-lo até que um dia Ryan morre subitamente...

programme.title: Prometo Amar-te
programme.desc: Após um terrível acidente de carro, Paige não se recorda da fase mais recente da sua vida, que engloba a relação com Leo e a carreira de artista. Como tal, Leo vê apenas uma alternativa para ter a sua família de volta: começar do zero e fazer com que o amor entre os dois renasça.

programme.title: Lobijovem
programme.desc: Scott Howard, um estudante de liceu, acredita estar condenado à indiferença e à banalidade na cruel hierarquia escolar. No entanto, acaba por se tornar num fenómeno local quando se transforma num lobisomem.

programme.title: Um Osso Duro de Roer
programme.desc: Patrick é um homem excêntrico e pouco sociável que vive sozinho com os pais numa casa rural de Washington. Nutre uma adoração possessiva pela irmã e quando esta aparece com o noivo Ryan, começa a deliberar como matá-lo. Só que nunca consegue fazê-lo até que um dia Ryan morre subitamente...

programme.title: O 5º Elemento
programme.desc: Terra, Ar, Água e Fogo: estes quatro elementos são o motor do Universo, mas há um quinto que ninguém conhece. Uma força do Mal, apoiada por Zorg, está disposta a quebrar esta união. Alheio a isto, Korben Dallas, um taxista, encontra uma jovem rapariga que é perseguida por um senhor do Mal.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: World Beyond
programme.sub-title: Family is a Four Letter Word

programme.title: O Senhor Babadook
programme.desc: Uma mãe, atormentada pela morte violenta do marido, luta contra o medo noturno que o filho tem de um monstro. Mas rapidamente descobre que uma presença sinistra se esconde na sua casa.

programme.title: Para Roma Com Amor
programme.desc: As vidas de turistas e moradores em Roma, os seus romances, aventuras e também os imprevistos que lhes acontecem.

programme.title: Rocco
programme.sub-title: Prima Che Il Gallo Canti - 1ª Parte

programme.title: Rocco
programme.sub-title: Prima Che Il Gallo Canti - 2ª Parte

programme.title: O Homem da Máscara de Ferro
programme.desc: Luís XIV é cruel e ambicioso: para subir ao trono, mandou encarcerar numa masmorra o seu irmão gémeo. Quando os três mosqueteiros descobrem este segredo, elaboram um plano de troca de identidade, a fim de dar a França o rei bondoso que merece.

programme.title: Se Eu Ficar
programme.desc: O que era suposto ser uma tranquila viagem em família transforma-se em tragédia e a vida de Mia fica presa por um fio. Entre a vida e a morte, Mia tem de tomar uma decisão que irá definir não só o seu destino, como também o daqueles que a rodeiam.

programme.title: Casamentos e Infidelidades
programme.desc: Nova Iorque, anos 40. Amigos de longa data, Harry e Richard estão apaixonados pela mesma mulher. Uma situação delicada que encontrará uma solução dramática.

programme.title: Meia-Noite em Paris
programme.desc: Uma família que viaja até Paris em negócios e dois jovens que pretendem casar no outono: todos vão viver experiências que mudarão as suas vidas. É a história do grande amor de um jovem por uma cidade e da ilusão que quase todas as pessoas sentem de que a vida dos outros é sempre melhor do que a sua.

programme.title: Nell
programme.desc: Ela é inocente e bonita, louca e livre como as criaturas da floresta que a rodeiam. Em conjunto com a mãe, Nell (Jodi Foster) tem uma vida simples na selva intocável de Smoky Mountains. Mas quando a mãe morre e dois físicos da cidade (Liam Neeson e Natasha Richardson) invadem a tranquilidade da...

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos 2
programme.desc: Amy, Travis e Graham são estudantes de cinema na Universidade de Alpine. Num ambiente de forte competividade, é convocado o prestigiado prémio Hitchcock para o melhor fime, como tese de final de curso. Quando começam a rodar o filme, dão-se estranhos e terroríficos acidentes.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Seus Olhos
programme.desc: Uma equipa de investigadores do FBI vê-se dividida, quando descobre que a filha da agente Jess foi assassinada. Treze anos depois, após uma obsessiva busca pelo assassino, surge uma nova pista. Mas ninguém está preparado para um inconfessável segredo.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: As Armas de Jane
programme.desc: Jane construiu uma nova vida com o seu marido Bill e a filha, nas perigosas planícies do Oeste. Mas quando este se envolve num tiroteio com John Bishop e regressa ferido, ela tem a certeza que Bishop não irá parar até que toda a família seja morta.

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Um antigo lenhador vem em auxílio de uma mulher que regressa à sua cidade natal no Noroeste do Pacífico e se vê assediada e perseguida por um ex-polícia transformado em senhor do crime.

programme.title: The Hunter's Prayer - Assassino Contratado
programme.desc: Jules, um assassino profissional, vai contra as ordens dos seus chefes e acaba a proteger Ella, a jovem que tinha sido contratado para matar. Assinalados para morrer, Jules e Ella formam uma aliança que coloca em risco as suas vidas.

programme.title: Mechanic: Assassino Profissional
programme.desc: Quando Arthur Bishop julgava que os seus dias como assassino eram coisa do passado, é forçado a voltar ao ativo quando Gina, o amor da sua vida, é raptada pelo seu inimigo mais perigoso. Mas na mira estão nomes, aparentemente, impossíveis de eliminar.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell - Agente do Futuro
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, Major é a primeira da sua espécie: um ser híbrido entre humano e ciborgue, concebida para ser o soldado perfeito e dedicada a parar os piores e mais perigosos criminosos no mundo.

programme.title: Enemy of the State
Inimigos de Estado
programme.sub-title: The Pointy End Of The Spear
programme.desc:
Enemy of the State: Directed by Tony Scott. With Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight, Lisa Bonet. A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120660/","name":"Enemy of the State","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI0Y2NhMzMtYTE5ZS00MDlhLTg0ZjEtMjAwZmEwNTc0ODc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120660/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"neilmac"},"dateCreated":"2003-12-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Crackerjack Thriller with a message...","reviewBody":"Why? Well for starters there is the best chase sequence since The French Connection. Then there is Will Smith as an actor - not just a star, though later in the movie he is admittedly overshadowed by veteran Gene Hackman.

There are two layers to this movie: On the surface is a pacy thriller with edge-of-the-seat chases but underneath lies a telling commentary on government surveillance. It is one of those truth-in-fiction stories which makes its point about government intrusion into privacy dramatically and effectively.

There are references to the classic, The Conversation: The surveilled couple talking in the park, and the Hackman character's premises are an obvious recreation of his workshop in the earlier movie. If you haven't yet seen The Conversation - see it before you see this one - you will understand the Hackman character a lot better (besides, it is a superb movie in its own right).

Oh, and Jon Voight is terrific as the bad guy...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":235012,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-02-24","keywords":"on the run,conspiracy,nsa,surveillance,national security agency","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Enemy of the State","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi384368921","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDlmZjZmZTAtOGE4My00ZWFkLTlmMmQtMTM5NTFhNTNkMTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDlmZjZmZTAtOGE4My00ZWFkLTlmMmQtMTM5NTFhNTNkMTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Buena Vista Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000432/","name":"Gene Hackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000685/","name":"Jon Voight"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0545861/","name":"David Marconi"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Category: Crime|Drama|Mystery|Crime|Drama|Mystery|Thriller
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Assalto ao Arranha-Céus
programme.desc: O polícia John McClane, de Nova Iorque, viaja até Los Angeles para passar as férias de Natal com a mulher. Porém, ao chegar ao prédio onde ela trabalha, percebe que o edifício está a ser assaltado por um bando de terroristas e decide atrapalhar os planos a fim de resgatá-la.

programme.title: Era uma Vez em Los Angeles
programme.desc: Steve Ford é um detetive privado de Los Angeles que já conheceu melhores dias. Quando o seu cão de estimação é roubado por um conhecido gangue, Steve terá de fazer alguns favores aos criminosos para o recuperar... e os sarilhos começam!

programme.title: Cavaleiros do Apocalipse
programme.desc: A existência de um detective emocionalmente distante dos seus dois filhos após a morte da sua adorada esposa.

programme.title: A Floresta
programme.desc: Uma jovem americana, Sara, viaja até à lendária floresta japonesa de Aokigahara, à procura da sua irmã gémea desaparecida. Avisada para "não sair do trilho", Sara está determinada a descobrir a verdade e, para tal, terá de enfrentar os espíritos malévolos.

programme.title: Blade Runner - Perigo Iminente
programme.desc: Em 2019, há uma classe de androides, os "Replicants": semelhantes ao Homem, mas com uma existência curta. O chefe da polícia de LA encarrega Rick Deckard de localizar e destruir as unidades em fuga. Na perseguição, Deckard conhece Rachel, que lhe dá uma nova perspetiva sobre os seres artificiais.

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Um antigo lenhador vem em auxílio de uma mulher que regressa à sua cidade natal no Noroeste do Pacífico e se vê assediada e perseguida por um ex-polícia transformado em senhor do crime.

programme.title: Os Filhos do Homem
programme.desc: Em 2027, o ser humano está à beira da extinção: os homens perderam a capacidade de procriar e, por algum motivo que se desconhece, as mulheres tornaram-se estéreis. Ao mesmo tempo, o mundo estremece quando morre um jovem de 18 anos, a pessoa mais jovem do planeta. A situação é caótica.

programme.title: Destroyer: Ajuste de Contas
programme.desc: A odisseia moral e existencialista da detetive da Polícia de Los Angeles Erin Bell que, enquanto jovem agente, esteve infiltrada num gangue no deserto da Califórnia. Um caso que resultou em trágicas consequências.

programme.title: Operação Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A coronel Katherine Powell comanda uma operação, no Quénia, que tem como objetivo capturar terroristas no Quénia. Contudo, vê a sua missão alterada de "captura" para "morte", no momento em que uma menina de nove anos entra na zona de conflito e origina uma disputa internacional.

programme.title: O Homem Que Brilha
programme.desc: Dois polícias são obrigados a trabalhar juntos para tentar descobrir um assassino conhecido como "Homem de Família".

programme.title: Fogo Cerrado
programme.desc: Orin Boyd é um polícia de Detroit que não segue as regras. Depois de ter salvado o vice-presidente, violando todas as ordens que recebeu, é transferido para um dos piores bairros distritais da cidade. Aí, Orin enfrenta um grupo de polícias corruptos que vendem heroína a passadores de droga.

programme.title: Nico - À Margem da Lei
programme.desc: Nico Toscani, um ex-agente da CIA obcecado com as memórias do Vietname, é colocado numa operação internacional. O objetivo é proteger um senador, o alvo perfeito para o próximo assassínio de um grupo de criminosos que ele tinha jurado desmascarar.

programme.title: Em Terra Selvagem
programme.desc: Um perito em artes marciais e defensor do ambiente luta contra uma grande empresa petrolífera.

programme.title: Corrupção Total
programme.desc: As toxinas enterradas em minas abandonadas podem transformar Jackson numa terra abandonada, caso ninguém o impeça. No entanto, Jack Taggart quer descobrir quem é o responsável por contaminar a terra e fazer algo em relação a isso.

programme.title: Jogo da Alta-Roda
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de Molly Bloom, uma esquiadora Olímpica que, durante uma década, organizou os jogos de póquer de alto risco mais exclusivos do mundo. Mas tudo mudou quando se tornou um alvo a abater pelo FBI.

programme.title: Catwoman
programme.desc: Patience Phillips trabalha na Hedare Beauty, uma gigantesca companhia de cosméticos. No entanto, quando descobre inadvertidamente um segredo, é apanhada no meio de uma sórdida conspiração. Morta pela sua patroa, Patience renasce transformada em "Catwoman" e dotada de poderes sobrenaturais.

programme.title: Antes de Adormecer
programme.desc: Christine acorda todos os dias sem memória do seu passado, depois de um acidente traumático. Por seu lado, o marido apresenta-se e explica-lhe a vida que têm em conjunto. No entanto, quando ela questiona aquilo que lhe é dito, novas verdades emergem e tudo parece suspeito.

programme.title: Jogos de Poder
programme.desc: A história verídica sobre um congressista texano, Charlie Wilson, com gosto para as bebidas e para as mulheres. Com a ajuda de um agente da CIA, com métodos pouco ortodoxos, a dupla financiou, sozinha, as guerrilhas afegãs nos anos 80, de modo a combater a invasão soviética do território.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Kennedy
programme.desc: A história dos sete dias mais difíceis na carreira do senador Ted Kennedy, que começam numa festa dos colaboradores da campanha de Bobby Kennedy na Ilha de Chappaquiddick. Ted abandona a festa cedo e oferece-se para dar uma fatídica boleia...

programme.title: Comportamento Perturbado
programme.desc: Steve Clark e a sua família acabam de se mudar para uma nova cidade. O primeiro dia no seu novo liceu é um choque para ele, porque todos os alunos parecem estar vestidos da maneira mais correcta e a sua educação é impecável. Mas Steve torna-se rapidamente amigo de dois colegas rebeldes....

programme.title: Eraser
programme.desc: John Kruger é Eraser, um destacado oficial do programa federal de proteção de testemunhas. Ele enfrenta um grande desafio profissional ao ter de proteger e fornecer uma nova identidade a Lee Cullen, uma jovem executiva de uma empresa de desenvolvimento tecnológico.

programme.title: A Floresta
programme.desc: Uma jovem americana, Sara, viaja até à lendária floresta japonesa de Aokigahara, à procura da sua irmã gémea desaparecida. Avisada para "não sair do trilho", Sara está determinada a descobrir a verdade e, para tal, terá de enfrentar os espíritos malévolos.

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Um antigo lenhador vem em auxílio de uma mulher que regressa à sua cidade natal no Noroeste do Pacífico e se vê assediada e perseguida por um ex-polícia transformado em senhor do crime.

programme.title: Na Corda Bamba
programme.desc: Rick recebeu uma nova identidade depois de ajudar o FBI a condenar um agente por tráfico de droga. Quinze anos depois, a sua ex-namorada, que o julgava morto, reconhece-o. Por outro lado, o agente corrupto sai em liberdade e procura vingança.

programme.title: Comportamento Perturbado
programme.desc: Steve Clark e a sua família acabam de se mudar para uma nova cidade. O primeiro dia no seu novo liceu é um choque para ele, porque todos os alunos parecem estar vestidos da maneira mais correcta e a sua educação é impecável. Mas Steve torna-se rapidamente amigo de dois colegas rebeldes....

programme.title: O Castor
programme.desc: Walter Black é um homem cuja depressão tomou conta da sua vida. Sem saber mais o que fazer para o ajudar, e temendo que aquela prostração prejudique o crescimento dos filhos de ambos, Meredith, a sua mulher, opta pelo divórcio. É então que Walter encontra um "castor-fantoche".

programme.title: Fátima
programme.desc: Maio de 2016. Um grupo de 11 mulheres parte de Vinhais, em peregrinação a Fátima. Ao longo de nove dias e 400 quilómetros, atravessam meio país em esforço e sacrifício para cumprir as suas promessas. Chegadas a Fátima, cada uma terá de reencontrar o seu próprio caminho para a redenção.

programme.title: Olhos Grandes
programme.desc: No final dos anos 1950, o pintor Walter Keane alcançou um sucesso inacreditável com as suas pinturas de crianças com olhos grandes. A chocante verdade acaba, no entanto, por ser descoberta: as obras de Walter eram criadas pela sua mulher, Margaret.

programme.title: Sorte à Logan
programme.desc: Jimmy Logan, o seu irmão maneta e Mellie, a irmã cabeleireira, elaboram um plano arriscado para roubar uma pista de corridas. Mas para complicar tudo, um imprevisto obriga-os a executar o assalto durante a mais popular das corridas de Nascar.

programme.title: O Especialista
programme.desc: Uma bela mulher com um passado fatal jurou vingar-se dos mafiosos que mataram os seus pais e, para o fazer, contrata os serviços de um especialista em explosivos, ex-membro da CIA.

programme.title: Phil
programme.desc: Phil, um dentista deprimido em crise de meia-idade, tenta aprender por que um dos seus pacientes mais felizes de repente comete suicídio, e uma aventura cómica escura segue-se.

programme.title: Outlander

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Crisântemos Para Que Vos Quero
programme.desc: Abby Knight volta à sua cidade natal para abrir uma loja de flores mas, no dia da inauguração, o seu carro sofre um acidente por causa de um criminoso em fuga.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Cortar o Mal Pela Raiz
programme.desc: Uma ex-advogada, agora florista numa pequena cidade, Abby Knight, tem um bom faro para investigação e rapidamente se envolve num caso de homicídio, juntamente com o ex-detetive particular, Marco Salvatore, dono do bar local.

programme.title: Amigos Coloridos
programme.desc: Jamie, uma executiva de recursos humanos, tenta convencer um potencial candidato, Dylan, a mudar-se para Nova Iorque. Apesar da atração mútua, depressa chegam à conclusão de que representam tudo aquilo que sempre quiseram evitar numa relação. Por isso, decidem ser apenas amigos... coloridos.

programme.title: A Cidade dos Anjos
programme.desc: Seth, um anjo recém-chegado à Terra, preocupa-se exageradamente com as questões humanas e acaba por entrar numa relação amorosa com uma cirurgiã especializada em doenças cardíacas. Entre ambos surge uma paixão impossível, o que leva a que ambos desafiem as leis que definem a sua existência.

programme.title: Você Tem Uma Mensagem
programme.desc: Dois livreiros criam uma rivalidade quando um deles, com um negócio em maior escala, quase leva o outro à falência. No entanto, sem que saibam, os dois vão comunicando pela internet e acabam por se apaixonar. O problema é que, na vida real, eles se odeiam...

programme.title: Mulheres!
programme.desc: Mary é uma mulher moderna, casada com Stephen, um homem de negócios nova-iorquino. Fiel ao marido e mãe de uma filha, está rodeada das suas "amigas". Mas elas sabem uma coisa que ela ignora: O marido anda a traí-la com Crystal Allen.

programme.title: Linhas Cruzadas
programme.desc: Três irmãs unem-se ao aproximar-se a morte do pai, com o qual não tinham uma ligação forte.

programme.title: Marrying Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: Cerca de seis meses depois das discussões no desfile de cães em Washington, a professora Elizabeth Scott e o empresário/filantropo Donovan Darcy estão loucamente apaixonados e vão casar.

programme.title: Lado a Lado
programme.desc: Isabel é uma jovem fotógrafa de moda que namora com Luke, divorciado de Jackie e com dois filhos. Ganhar o amor dos seus filhos revela-se muito difícil, sobretudo porque a mãe, Jackie, não está disposta a partilhá-los com outra mulher.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Loin Des Yeux, Loin Du Coeur
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Argumento de Amor
programme.desc: Keith Michaels já foi um argumentista de sucesso, premiado pela Academia, mas o seu momento de glória passou e enfrenta agora graves problemas financeiros. Como tal, aceita dar aulas a universitários, embora despreze a profissão de professor.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Cortar o Mal Pela Raiz
programme.desc: Uma ex-advogada, agora florista numa pequena cidade, Abby Knight, tem um bom faro para investigação e rapidamente se envolve num caso de homicídio, juntamente com o ex-detetive particular, Marco Salvatore, dono do bar local.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Arranjos de Lírios
programme.desc: Abby Knight é uma bela ex-advogada e proprietária de Bloomers, uma pitoresca loja de flores. Abby e Marco, dono de um bar e ex-investigador, descobrem o corpo de Jack Sutcliff, um vigarista que tentou interromper o casamento da prima de Abby.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Toute Vérité N'Est Pas Bonne à Dire
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dança Feroz
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe, o cubano Rafael Infante vai para Houston trabalhar na escola de dança de John Burnett. Faz limpezas e pequenos serviços, enquanto observa os dançarinos e se apaixona por Ruby, que sonha vencer o Campeonato Mundial de Las Vegas, mesmo que, para isso, tenha de abrir mão do amor.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Laurie Strode vai confrontar pela última vez Michael Myers, a figura mascarada que a persegue desde que conseguiu escapar da matança no Halloween há quatro décadas...

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Passaram dez anos desde o primeiro encontro entre Hannibal Lecter e a agente do FBI Clarice Starling, mas há algo que não mudou: Hannibal continua a ser o pior pesadelo de Clarice. Depois de fugir do hospital psiquiátrico, Hannibal muda de identidade e encontra refúgio na cidade de Florença.

Big Al fez inúmeros inimigos ao longo da vida, mas nenhum mais perigoso do que a sua grande paixão, Kat. Os dois vivem do crime, do tráfico de armas e de assaltos, mas Kat quer mais e começa a vender armas, entrando num mundo novo e do qual Big Al não faz parte.

programme.title: Cães à Solta
programme.desc: Max, um solitário Rottweiler que trabalha para a polícia de Nova Iorque, tem como missão infiltrar-se na exposição canina mais elitista do mundo! Para evitar o desastre, terá ao seu lado Frank, um agente do FBI com quem não tem as melhores relações.

programme.title: O Céu Existe Mesmo
programme.desc: Todd e Sonja Burpo são um casal cujo filho diz ter visitado o Céu durante uma experiência de quase-morte. Colton conta em detalhe a sua espantosa viagem e a família enfrenta o desafio de avaliar o significado deste evento marcante.

programme.title: Moneyball - Jogada de Risco
programme.desc: Em 2002, Billy Beane, treinador dos Oakland Athletics, enfrenta uma situação crítica: está a perder os melhores jogadores. Determinado a vencer a qualquer custo, procura uma solução a custo zero: com a ajuda de um economista, baseado em teorias e estatísticas, cria uma equipa teoricamente perfeita!

programme.title: Tornado
programme.desc: Nesta turbulenta e emocionante aventura, dois cientistas enfrentam o tornado mais destrutivo da história da América nos últimos 50 anos. Não tendo forma de o deter, os cientistas procuram lançar sensores dentro do funil do tornado. Mas para o conseguir, têm que adivinhar o caminho do furacão.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hanna, de 16 anos, não é uma rapariga comum. Criada pelo pai, um ex-agente da CIA no ponto mais remoto da Finlândia, ela tem a força, a resistência e o instinto aguçado de um soldado. A sua educação e treino têm o mesmo objetivo: tudo funciona para fazer dela a assassina perfeita.

programme.title: A Máscara de Zorro
programme.desc: Passaram mais de 20 anos desde que Don Diego de la Vega lutou com sucesso contra a opressão espanhola, com o lendário e romântico nome de Zorro. Preso durante duas décadas, tem agora de encontrar um sucessor para travar Don Rafael Montero, que regressou ao território com um louco projeto na manga.

programme.title: Uma Questão de Honra
programme.desc: Dois advogados têm a cargo a defesa de dois soldados do corpo de infantaria da marinha norte-americana, acusados de terem assassinado um camarada que supostamente "infringiu o código".

programme.title: Jogo de Espiões
programme.desc: Um operativo da CIA, Nathan Muir, está prestes a reformar-se quando descobre que o seu protegido, Tom Bishop, foi preso na China por espionagem. Nada estranho aos mecanismos de funcionamento da CIA, Muir enceta todos os esforços para libertar Bishop.

programme.title: Vampiros de John Carpenter
programme.desc: Jack Crow é o líder de uma equipa de mercenários contratados secretamente pelo Vaticano e cujo objetivo é caçar vampiros. Após a destruição de um "ninho" de vampiros no Novo México, a equipa é subitamente surpreendida por uma emboscada, durante a festa de celebração da vitória.

programme.title: Pesadelo em Elm Street
programme.desc: Fred Krueger, um assassino de crianças, persegue as suas vítimas durante os sonhos. Os "escolhidos" são os filhos de uma turba humana que se juntou para o linchar.

programme.title: Um Ajuste de Contas
programme.desc: Depois de 19 anos na prisão por um crime que não cometeu, Frank sai em liberdade e decide fazer um ajuste de contas. A única coisa que poderá desviá-lo de ir avante com o seu violento plano de vingança, é o reencontro inesperado com o seu filho.

programme.title: Dead Trigger
programme.desc: Um misterioso vírus matou milhões de pessoas e transformou muitas outras em zombies sedentos de sangue... Incapaz de deter o vírus, o governo recruta jovens para formar um pelotão de elite: Dead Trigger.

programme.title: Silver - A Lenda do Cavalo Prateado
programme.desc: Uma mãe conta à filha uma fábula sobre o príncipe dos cavalos selvagens da Austrália, que tem de encontrar o seu lugar entre os outros equídeos e ao mesmo tempo proteger-se do homem que assumiu por missão capturá-lo e domá-lo.

programme.title: Fahrenheit 11/9
programme.desc: Visão cómica e provocadora dos tempos que vivemos. Explora as duas questões cruciais da "Era Trump": como viemos aqui parar? Como saímos nós daqui?

programme.title: Adama
programme.desc: Em 1914, Adama, um garoto de 12 anos da África Ocidental, parte em busca do irmão mais velho que desapareceu. Levado pelo desespero e pelo romantismo da infância, o jovem atravessa uma Europa à beira da guerra e nem o inferno da linha da frente o vai impedir de chegar ao seu destino.

programme.title: Tornado
programme.desc: Nesta turbulenta e emocionante aventura, dois cientistas enfrentam o tornado mais destrutivo da história da América nos últimos 50 anos. Não tendo forma de o deter, os cientistas procuram lançar sensores dentro do funil do tornado. Mas para o conseguir, têm que adivinhar o caminho do furacão.

programme.title: Backtrace - Rasto de Violência
programme.desc: Macdonald ficou gravemente ferido num assalto e perdeu a memória. Preso durante sete anos, consegue fugir do estabelecimento de alta segurança injetado com uma droga experimental que lhe devolve a memória e a lembrança de onde escondeu o dinheiro.

programme.title: Presa Implacável
programme.desc: O capitão Matt Hendricks e Linda Christian encontram-se presos num submarino com terroristas russos que ameaçam lançar um vírus letal no território americano.

programme.title: Mil e Uma Maneiras de Bater as Botas
programme.desc: Albert é um pastor cobarde que se apaixona por uma misteriosa mulher, acabada de chegar à cidade. No entanto, quando o marido da beldade, um famoso fora da lei, chega à procura de vingança, o pastor vai ter de pôr à prova a sua recém-descoberta coragem.

programme.title: Má Vizinhança
programme.desc: Um jovem casal, que ainda está a adaptar-se às novas rotinas que o nascimento da sua filha trouxe, passa a ser vizinho de uma república de estudantes, que se instala na casa do lado. Uma lembrança constante de tudo o que tiveram de abdicar para serem pais.

programme.title: A Última Noitada
programme.desc: Ethan, Isaac e Chris passam juntos a noite de Natal há 10 anos. Uma noite de deboche, para quebrar todas as regras. Mas chegou a última noite desta tradição e, quando ela terminar, estes três grandes amigos ganharão finalmente algum juízo. Ou não...

programme.title: Missão Impossível: Nação Secreta
programme.desc: Com a IMF desmantelada e Ethan Hunt excluído, a equipa enfrenta uma poderosa rede de agentes qualificados, o Sindicato. Este grupo está determinado a criar uma nova ordem mundial através de ataques terroristas. Esta poderá mesmo ser a missão mais impossível de sempre!

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2534388761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"=G=","dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas."
